required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: CD19-targeted CAR T Cells （JWCAR029） for Primary Refractory Diffuse Large B Cell Lymphoma
clinical_study.official_title: CD19-targeted CAR T Cells （JWCAR029） for Primary Refractory Diffuse Large B Cell Lymphoma, Phase Ⅰ,Open-label,Single-arm,Muticenter Study

lead_sponsor.agency: Shanghai Ming Ju Biotechnology Co., Ltd.

clinical_study.source: Shanghai Ming Ju Biotechnology Co., Ltd.

brief_summary.textblock: This is a phase I, open-label, single-arm, multicenter study to assess the safety and efficacy of JWCAR029 in adult primary refractory DLBCL subjects in China

detailed_description.textblock:
This is a phase I, open-label, single-arm, multicenter study conducted in adult subjects with primary refractory DLBCL in China to evaluate the safety, efficacy, pharmacokinetics(PK), pharmacodynamics(PD) of JWCAR029 and collect immune response after JWCAR029 treatment.
One dose level of 1.0 x 10^8 CAR+ T cells is adopted in this study. All sujects will be followed for 2 years after JWCAR029 infusion.

primary_outcome.measure: Types, frequency, and severity of adverse events and laboratory anomalies

secondary_outcome.measure: Complete response rate (CRR) in primary refractory DLBCL subjects
secondary_outcome.time_frame: 1 month
secondary_outcome.description: Investigator evaluated CRR in 1 month

secondary_outcome.measure: Objective response rate (ORR) in primary refractory DLBCL subjects
secondary_outcome.time_frame: 1 month
secondary_outcome.description: Investigator evaluated ORR in 1 month

secondary_outcome.time_frame: 2 years
secondary_outcome.description: The best response from the onset of treatment to the onset of disease progression/recurrence or to the onset of another anticancer treatment

secondary_outcome.time_frame: 3 months
secondary_outcome.description: Complete response rate (CRR)

secondary_outcome.time_frame: 3 months
secondary_outcome.description: Complete response (CR) + partial response（PR）

secondary_outcome.time_frame: up to 24 months after JWCAR029 infusion
secondary_outcome.description: Time from first response(PR or CR) to disease progression or death from any cause

secondary_outcome.time_frame: up to 24 months after JWCAR029 infusion
secondary_outcome.description: Time from complete response (CR) to disease progression or death from any cause

secondary_outcome.time_frame: up to 24 months after JWCAR029 infusion
secondary_outcome.description: Time from JWCAR029 infusion to first documentation of CR or PR

secondary_outcome.time_frame: up to 24 months after JWCAR029 infusion
secondary_outcome.description: Time from JWCAR029 infusion to first documentation of CR

secondary_outcome.time_frame: up to 1 year after JWCAR029 infusion
secondary_outcome.description: Maximum observed concentration of JWCAR029 in peripheral blood

secondary_outcome.time_frame: up to 1 year after JWCAR029 infusion
secondary_outcome.description: Time to maximum concentration of JWCAR029 in the peripheral blood

secondary_outcome.time_frame: up to 1 year after JWCAR029 infusion
secondary_outcome.description: Area under the concentration vs time curve of JWCAR029

secondary_outcome.time_frame: up to 2 year after JWCAR029 infusion
secondary_outcome.description: Progression-free survival

secondary_outcome.time_frame: up to 2 year after JWCAR029 infusion
secondary_outcome.description: Overall survival

secondary_outcome.measure: Changes of CRP and serum ferritin
secondary_outcome.time_frame: 1 year after JWCAR029 infusion
secondary_outcome.description: Changes of inflammation biomarkers-CRP and serum ferritin

secondary_outcome.time_frame: up to 2 year after JWCAR029 infusion
secondary_outcome.description: The level of anti-therapeutic JWCAR029 antibody after JWCAR029 infusion

secondary_outcome.time_frame: up to 2 year after JWCAR029 infusion
secondary_outcome.description: The concentration of Car-T cells

secondary_outcome.measure: The proportion of Car-T cell subgroups
secondary_outcome.time_frame: up to 2 year after JWCAR029 infusion
secondary_outcome.description: The proportion of Car-T cell subgroups after infusion

secondary_outcome.measure: The concentration of CD19 in tumor biopsy samples
secondary_outcome.time_frame: up to 2 year after JWCAR029 infusion
secondary_outcome.description: The concentration of CD19 in tumor biopsy samples

secondary_outcome.measure: The change of serum cytokines concentration
secondary_outcome.time_frame: up to 2 year after JWCAR029 infusion
secondary_outcome.description: The change of serum cytokines concentration after JWCAR029 infusion

arm_group.description: The safety and efficacy of JWCAR029 will be evaluated in 1 x 10^8 CAR+T cells dose level

intervention.description: Subjects will undergo leukapheresis to isolate peripheral blood mononuclear cells (PBMCs) for the production of JWCAR029. During JWCAR029 production, subjects will receive a conditioning chemotherapy regimen of cyclophosphamide and fludarabine for the purpose of lymphocytes depletion. After lymphodepletion, subjects will receive 1 x 10^8 CAR+T cells (JWCAR029) treatment by intravenous (IV) injection.
